K.G.F: Chapter 1

Rank: 848


In the 1970s- a gangster named Rocky goes undercover as a slave to assassinate the owner of a notorious gold mine known as the Kolar Gold Fields.


Director: Prashanth Neel

Writer: M Chandramouli, Raaghav Vinay Shivagange, Prashanth Neel

Stars: Yash, Srinidhi Shetty, Ramachandra Raju

Tags: Action Epic, Epic, Gangster, One,Person Army Action, Period Drama, Action, Crime, Drama, Thriller
